meanings.definition: Dry, spongy wood used as tinder.
meanings.sent1: I gathered some touchwood to start the campfire.
meanings.sent2: The touchwood caught fire easily and helped us cook dinner.
meanings.sent3: The touchwood decided to show off its fire-starting skills at the barbecue.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like touchwood, always ready to ignite and overcome obstacles.
meanings.sent5: The touchwood crackled and glowed, lighting up the dark forest.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that is a dependable source of help or support.
meanings.sent1: My best friend is my touchwood in times of need.
meanings.sent2: The flashlight became our touchwood during the power outage.
meanings.sent3: The touchwood teddy bear magically fixed all the broken toys in the room.
meanings.sent4: Her advice was like touchwood, guiding me through tough decisions.
meanings.sent5: He was the touchwood that kept the team together during challenging projects.
